feed.title: TasmoAdmin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for TasmoAdmin: v4.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Limit ajax concurrency by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1273
  • Fix docker builds by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1275
  • Bump friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer from 3.64.0 to 3.65.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1278
  • Bump codecov/codecov-action from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1272
  • Bump @fortawesome/fontawesome-free from 6.6.0 to 6.7.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1277
  • Bump @node-minify/clean-css from 8.0.6 to 9.0.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1270
  • Bump symfony/http-client from 6.4.14 to 6.4.15 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1266
  • Bump @node-minify/terser from 8.0.6 to 9.0.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1268
  • Bump @node-minify/core from 8.0.6 to 9.0.2 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1269
  • Bump prettier from 3.3.3 to 3.4.2 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1281
  • Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.12.7 to 2.0.3 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1280

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/compare/v4.2.0...v4.2.1

entry.title: New release for TasmoAdmin: v4.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump @fortawesome/fontawesome-free from 6.7.1 to 6.7.2 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1286
  • Bump phpstan/phpstan from 2.0.3 to 2.1.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1290
  • Bump glob from 11.0.0 to 11.0.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1291
  • Bump friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer from 3.65.0 to 3.68.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1293
  • Bump esbuild from 0.24.0 to 0.24.2 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1287
  • Extend device MQTT range to max port by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1295

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/compare/v4.2.1...v4.2.2

entry.title: New release for TasmoAdmin: v4.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Tighten PHPStan by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1297
  • Escape config read by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1298
  • Tighten redirect helper by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1299
  • Bump alpine to 3.21 by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1300
  • Execute docker build in pipeline per arch by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1301
  • Bump phpstan/phpstan from 2.1.1 to 2.1.2 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1302
  • Bump filp/whoops from 2.16.0 to 2.17.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1304
  • Bump friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer from 3.68.1 to 3.68.5 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1305
  • Improve quality make goal by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1307

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/compare/v4.2.2...v4.2.3

entry.title: New release for TasmoAdmin: v4.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add pages to php-cs-fixer lint by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1309
  • Make config read stricter by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1308
  • Bump phpstan/phpstan from 2.1.2 to 2.1.4 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1310
  • Bump prettier from 3.4.2 to 3.5.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1312
  • Bump esbuild from 0.24.2 to 0.25.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1313
  • Improve device removal logic by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1314
  • Bump prettier from 3.5.0 to 3.5.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1317
  • Bump phpstan/phpstan from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1315
  • Bump friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer from 3.68.5 to 3.69.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1316
  • Bump esbuild from 0.25.0 to 0.25.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1325
  • Bump filp/whoops from 2.17.0 to 2.18.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1328
  • Bump phpstan/phpstan from 2.1.5 to 2.1.11 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1331
  • Bump prettier from 3.5.1 to 3.5.3 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1320
  • Bump friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer from 3.69.0 to 3.73.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1330
  • Fix fgetcsv and fputcsv deprecated warnings by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1332
  • Add depreciated, bump ubuntu by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1333
  • Bump guzzlehttp/guzzle from 7.9.2 to 7.9.3 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1334
  • Bump friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer from 3.73.1 to 3.74.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1335
  • Bump esbuild from 0.25.1 to 0.25.2 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1336
  • Pin composer to 2.8.6 by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1337
  • Extract dependency versions in Docker configuration by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1340
  • Configure Renovate by @renovate in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1341
  • Bump friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer from 3.74.0 to 3.75.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1338
  • Add S6 to renovate by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1345
  • Update composer Docker tag to v2.8.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1343
  • Remove dependabot, move renovate config by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1346
  • Fix params in docker build by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1354
  • Bump PHP to 8.4 by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1296
  • Improve renovate version bumping for composer + node by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1355
  • Update dependency phpstan/phpstan to v2.1.12 by @renovate in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1353
  • Update symfony packages to v6.4.19 by @renovate in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1348
  • Restrict major bump for symfony + phpunit with renovate by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1356
  • Update Node.js to v20.19.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1349
  • Update dependency phpunit/phpunit to v10.5.45 by @renovate in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1357
  • Update Node.js to v22 by @renovate in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1350

New Contributors

  • @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1341

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/compare/v4.2.3...v4.3.0

entry.title: New release for TasmoAdmin: v4.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add support section to readme by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1358
  • Add pre-commit for linting by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1359
  • Add more tests by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1360
  • Update dependency esbuild to v0.25.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1361
  • Update Node.js to v22.15.0 - autoclosed by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1362
  • Update dependency glob to v11.0.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1363
  • Update PHPStan packages to v2.1.13 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1364
  • Use diff volume for tmp files in local dev by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1366
  • Update dependency phpstan/phpstan to v2.1.14 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1368
  • Update dependency symfony/http-foundation to v6.4.21 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1367
  • Update dependency phpunit/phpunit to v10.5.46 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1369
  • Update dependency esbuild to v0.25.4 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1374
  • Update dependency league/commonmark to v2.7.0 [SECURITY] by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1373
  • Update PHPStan packages to v2.1.15 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1375
  • Migrate renovate config by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1380
  • Update composer Docker tag to v2.8.9 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1379
  • Update dependency phpstan/phpstan to v2.1.16 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1381
  • Add alpine rule to renovate for docker builder by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1386
  • Update renovate for qemu and alpine by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1387
  • Update Node.js to v22.16.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1376
  • Update dependency esbuild to v0.25.5 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1383
  • Update symfony to v6.4.22 - autoclosed by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1384
  • Update dependency phpstan/phpstan to v2.1.17 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1382
  • Update dependency filp/whoops to v2.18.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1388
  • Update dependency glob to v11.0.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1389
  • Update symfony to v6.4.23 - autoclosed by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1393
  • Update dependency esbuild to v0.25.8 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1395
  • Update dependency friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer to v3.84.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1394
  • Update dependency phpunit/phpunit to v10.5.48 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1390
  • Update composer Docker tag to v2.8.10 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1396
  • Bump alpine to 3.22 by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1398
  • Update dependency league/commonmark to v2.7.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1397
  • Update Node.js to v22.17.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1392
  • Update dependency prettier to v3.6.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1391

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/compare/v4.3.0...v4.3.1
